INC1L.VS.summary: UTIB INVL Technology is a principal investment firm. The firm primarily invests as a cluster of IT businesses with a focus in three areas, such as business climate improvement and e-governance, IT services and software, and cyber security. The firm typically invests in Northern and Eastern Europe, countries of Sub-Saharan Africa and South and Southeast Asia. The company was formerly known as BAIP Grupe AB. UTIB INVL Technology was founded in 2015 and is based in Vilnius, Lithuania.

IVL1L.VS.summary: Invalda INVL, AB is a private equity firm specializing in investments in small and middle-market privately-held companies, acquisitions and buyouts in undervalued assets. The firm primarily invests in real estate, agriculture, agricultural land, furniture manufacturing, information technology, banking, and facilities management infrastructure sectors. It seeks to invest in Lithuania, Latvia, European Union, mainly in Western Europe and internationally. It seeks to exercise control or significant influence over target businesses. The firm prefers to exit its investment when the portfolio company has a liquidity event, such as a sale, recapitalization or listing in the stock exchange. Invalda INVL, AB was formerly known as Invalda LT. Invalda INVL, AB was founded in 1991 and is based in Vilnius, Lithuania.
